sentences.sContent: The novel contains more narrative than dialogue.
sentences.sContent_eng: The novel contains more narrative than dialogue.
sentences.sCn: 这部小说里的叙述比对话多。

sentences.sContent: If this story must be written, we must have the courage to eliminate all adjectives that tend to excite wonder: they would achieve the opposite effect, of impoverishing the narrative.
sentences.sContent_eng: If this story must be written, we must have the courage to eliminate all adjectives that tend to excite wonder: they would achieve the opposite effect, of impoverishing the narrative.
sentences.sCn: 如果必须要写这篇故事，我们必须要有勇气剔除易于激发我们想入非非的所有形容词：这些词会使叙述贫瘠无力，起到相反的效果。

synos.tran: 叙事的，叙述的；叙事体的
